trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 提供安裝的語音合成引擎功能的存取權。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立新<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件，它會使用預設系統語音。

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>若要使用的已安裝的語音合成文字轉換語音 （」） 之其中一個，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的語音已安裝的資訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis:
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也會提供控制語音合成的下列層面：

trans-unit.source: To configure the output for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的輸出<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生語音，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可能會產生文字的語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>物件，或從[語音合成標記語言 (SSML) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)。

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要暫停及繼續語音合成器，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增或移除 lexicon 除外，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可以使用一或多個 lexicon 除外，來引導其發音的文字。

trans-unit.source: To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的語音輸出傳遞，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發事件會在遇到提示中的特定功能: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>)。

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: 它也會引發報告的開始事件 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) 和 end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) 的說話作業和讀出聲音的變更 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 物件的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and speaks a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式，以初始化一部分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件，並說出的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 當您初始化新<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>執行個體，它會使用預設系統語音。

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>若要使用的已安裝的語音合成文字轉換語音 （」） 之其中一個，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的語音已安裝的資訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: 語彙資訊的位置。

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 字典的媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 媒體類型不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將字典加入至 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 發音 lexicon 是的單字或片語，以及其發音，由字母與支援的語音字母的字元組成的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式中指定自訂發音為特製化的詞彙，您可以使用詞典 」。

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 外部字典檔中指定的發音的優先順序高於語音合成器的內部詞素或字典的發音。

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 不過，發音中建立的任何提示中指定內嵌<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>方法的優先順序高於任何詞典 」 中指定的發音。

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌發音僅適用於單一次出現的文字。

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[lexicon 除外和注音字母](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter:
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入至多個 lexicon 除外<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件。目前支援兩個值`mediaType`參數：

trans-unit.source: The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: 值`application/pls+xml`指出 lexicon 符合[發音 Lexicon 規格 (PLS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766)。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: 這是要使用的慣用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: 值`application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex`指出 lexicon 格式為未壓縮的字詞，這是 Microsoft 專屬格式。

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: 這是舊版的格式，而且我們建議您使用上面所述的 PLS 格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the effect of adding and removing a lexicon that contains a custom pronunciation for the word "blue".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範加入和移除詞典 」 包含單字"blue"的自訂發音的效果。

trans-unit.source: The lexicon defines the pronunciation of "blue" to sound like "bleep".
trans-unit.target: Lexicon 定義為"blue"發音如同 「 bleep"。

trans-unit.source: While the lexicon is loaded, the speech synthesizer uses the pronunciation defined in the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 載入詞典 」 時，語音合成器會使用 「 詞典 」 中定義的發音。

trans-unit.source: Following are the contents of the lexicon file Blue.pls:
trans-unit.target: 以下是 Blue.pls lexicon 檔案的內容：

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 在提示中遇到書籤時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>處理任一時引發這個事件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的資料的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入書籤使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a prompt that includes two bookmarks and sends the output to a WAV file for playback.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立包含兩個書籤，並將輸出傳送到播放 WAV 檔案的提示。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event writes the name of the bookmark and its position in the audio stream when the event was raised to the console.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>主控台引發事件時，事件會寫入及音訊資料流中的其位置的書籤的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 處置 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件，並釋放工作階段期間所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose" /> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: 在未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose" /> 方法時，做為清除資源的防護措施。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 正在讀出的提示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前說出的提示物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that are currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前已安裝在系統上的語音合成 (文字轉換語音) 語音集合。

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices (engines for text-to-speech) it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>，此方法會驗證語音 （文字轉換語音引擎） 的每個找到的中登錄符合某些最小的準則。

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證任何語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>設定其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性`False`。

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法選取語音其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性是`False`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有已安裝的語音合成 (文字轉換語音) 語音。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前安裝在系統上的語音的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 語音是安裝在系統的語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and outputs to the console a list of the installed voices (engines for speech synthesis) and demonstrates the information that is available for each voice.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式，以初始化一部分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件輸出至主控台已安裝的語音 （語音合成引擎） 的清單，並示範可供每個語音的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: 語音必須支援的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: 傳回支援特定地區設定的所有已安裝語音合成 (文字轉換語音) 語音。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前安裝在系統上且支援指定的地區設定的語音的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何已安裝的語音支援指定的地區設定，這個方法會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼。

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行文字轉換語音使用文化特性屬性中指定的語言，必須安裝支援該語言的國家/地區的程式碼的語音合成引擎。

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes:
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Microsoft Windows 7 的語音合成引擎使用下列語言的國家/地區代碼：

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: 英文 （美國）

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-chs 和 CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中國）

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-chs 和 TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （台灣）

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and outputs to the console a list of the installed voices that support the en-US locale.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式，以初始化一部分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件，並輸出至主控台已安裝的語音支援 EN-US 地區設定的清單。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 暫停 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: 到達音素時引發。

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: 音素是基本的撰寫語言元件，通常代表一或多個相異的音效英文字母 （或兩個字母的組合） 的字母。

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter "c" is a phoneme that may sound like "s" in "cinder", or like "k" in "catch".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字母"c"是似乎像是中 「 cinder"、"s"或"k"在"catch"像音素。

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: 書寫的文字是音素的組合。

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: 在 word 變更音素會改變其拼字檢查。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>執行個體會產生<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>單字構成音素的每個部分的事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word "theme" would generate three <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> events; one for the "th" sound, one for the "e" sound, and one for the "m" sound (me).
trans-unit.target: 例如，word 「 主題 」 會產生三個<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>"th"音效、 另一個用於"e"聲音，和另一個用於"m"聲音 (me); 事件。

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例和資料與事件相關聯的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件的讀出速率。

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件的說話速率，從 -10 到 10。

trans-unit.source: The following example speaks a string with the speaking rate set to -2.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定為-2 的讀出速率與來說字串。

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: 字典文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件中移除字典。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 在暫停 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件之後使其繼續。

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: 要選取之語音的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: 依名稱選取特定的語音。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取語音，請傳送的整個內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>屬性做為引數<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件會選取第一個已安裝的語音，其中包含`name`的語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>執行區分大小寫，子字串比較來決定是否要符合的語音`name`。

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證任何語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>設定其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性`False`。

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法選取語音其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性是`False`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取語音的性別、 年齡或地區設定，請使用其中一種<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with specific characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 選取特定特性的語音。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>方法和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>類別，以取得安裝可選取的文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that matches the specified characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件會選取第一個已安裝的語音符合指定的特性。

trans-unit.target: 無法驗證任何語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>設定其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性`False`。

trans-unit.target: 若要依名稱選取語音，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件，會發現安裝 voices 其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>屬性比對`gender`和`age`參數。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼。

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行使用中所指定語言的文字轉換語音`culture`參數、 語音合成引擎支援，必須安裝語言國家/地區的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes:
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Microsoft Windows 7 的語音合成引擎使用下列語言的國家/地區代碼：

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: 英文 （美國）

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-chs 和 CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中國）

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-chs 和 TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （台灣）

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證任何語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>設定其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性`False`。

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法選取語音其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性是`False`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取其他特性為基礎的語音，請參閱其他<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要依名稱選取語音，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: 要附加合成輸出的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The format to use for the synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: 用於合成輸出的格式。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出附加至音訊資料流。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>釋放<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的資料流的參考。

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他輸出組態選項，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to send output to the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出傳送至預設音訊裝置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Sound** window in the Windows **Control Panel** to configure the default audio device for the computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用**聲音**windows 視窗**控制台**設定電腦的預設音訊裝置。

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他輸出組態選項，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the synthesizer to speak a phrase to the default audio output.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用合成器能夠暢所欲言預設音訊輸出的片語。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to not send output from synthesis operations to a device, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，不將來自合成作業的輸出傳送至裝置、檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ‘s reference to a file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來釋放<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的檔案或資料流的參考。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他輸出組態選項，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出附加至波形音訊格式的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the file, reconfigure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 釋放<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的參考至檔案，重新設定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的輸出，例如，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他輸出組態選項，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a file that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出附加至包含波形格式音訊的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To configure the output and specify the audio format, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定輸出和指定的音訊格式，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an instance of <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> to play a prompt that has been output to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用的執行個體<xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>播放已輸出.wav 檔案的提示。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> call is asynchronous, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instance is created (and the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> method invoked) in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>呼叫是非同步的<xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>建立執行個體 (和<xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A>叫用方法) 中的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The audio format information.
trans-unit.target: 音訊格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file in a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出附加至指定格式的波形音訊格式檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the format of the output of speech synthesis and sends it to a WAV file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例指定語音合成輸出的格式，並將它傳送至 WAV 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: 要附加合成輸出的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a stream that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />物件，以便將輸出附加至包含波形格式音訊的資料流。

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream, reconfigure the synthesizer's output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 釋放<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的參考資料流，reconfigure 合成器的輸出，例如，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他輸出組態選項，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs a phrase to a WAV stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會輸出至 WAV 資料流的片語。

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式從字串、<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> 物件或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> 物件產生語音輸出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法以同步方式產生語音。

trans-unit.source: The methods do not return until the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instance has been completely spoken.
trans-unit.target: 方法不會傳回之前的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>完全說出執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest way to generate speech.
trans-unit.target: 這是最簡單的方式來產生語音。

trans-unit.source: However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method to generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您的應用程式需要時執行工作，例如反白顯示文字、 繪製動畫，監視控制項或其他工作，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法來以非同步方式產生語音。

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: 在這種方法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可能會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 合成器開始產生語音時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>不會引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>時處理的任何事件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的內容。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式讀出 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式說出的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>從字串的物件，並將物件傳遞的引數為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的內容。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式讀出 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式說出的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>從字串的物件，並將物件傳遞的引數為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式讀出字串的內容。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式使用字串，包含 SSML 標記，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式使用字串的內容，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法提供的最簡單的方式，來產生語音同步輸出。

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式從字串、<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> 物件或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> 物件產生語音輸出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法以非同步方式產生語音。

trans-unit.source: The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> object to finish speaking.
trans-unit.target: 方法會立即傳回而不需等待的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>来說完物件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>如果您的應用程式需要時執行工作，例如反白顯示文字，繪製動畫、 監視控制項或其他工作。

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: 在這種方法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可能會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 合成器開始產生語音時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 合成器完成時引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>作業。

trans-unit.source: If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式不需要執行工作時，您可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>方法來以同步方式產生語音。

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的內容。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式讀出 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消非同步說話的提示字元，搭配<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式說出的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>從字串的物件，並將物件傳遞的引數為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的內容。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式讀出 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含要讀出之內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式說出的內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>從字串的物件，並將物件傳遞的引數為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式讀出字串的內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含要讀出之內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式使用字串，包含 SSML 標記，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式使用字串的內容，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消非同步說話的提示字元，搭配<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>方法提供的最簡單的方式，來產生語音輸出以非同步的方式。

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: 要取消其語音讀出作業的內容。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: 取消已佇列提示的非同步合成作業。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個方法來取消非同步說話下列作業：

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.String>所指定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>所指定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.String>包含所指定的 SSML<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>，System.Speech 建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>物件，並填入內容的方法的參數，然後傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您保留一份傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>，您可以傳遞到<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A>取消讀出的內容中指定<xref:System.String>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>物件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: 取消所有已佇列、非同步的語音合成作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example show a use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> to cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt, so that a new prompt can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A>取消非同步說話的提示，以便可以說出新的提示字元。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event fires when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件時引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>取消作業。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 完成讀出提示時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件完成後的任何<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>類別沒有屬性，而且不傳回資料來源<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓應用程式作者撰寫事件處理常式，如<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 說出提示的每個字之後引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發這個事件，它使用任何的提示字元中，說出每個新字<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例和相關聯的事件資料的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The SSML string to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的 SSML 字串。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式讀出包含 SSML 標記的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: 內容`textToSpeak`參數必須包含`speak`項目且必須符合[語音合成標記語言 (SSML) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[語音合成標記語言參考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94)。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式使用字串，包含 SSML 標記，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>起始同步說話不包含 SSML 標記的字串。

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: 在這種方法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可能會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 合成器開始產生語音時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>不會引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>事件處理<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example renders the date 1/29/2009 as a date, in month, day, year order.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呈現日期的日期，月、 日、 年的順序為 1/29/2009年。

trans-unit.source: The SMML markup to speak.
trans-unit.target: 要讀出的 SMML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式讀出包含 SSML 標記的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: 內容`textToSpeak`參數必須包含`speak`項目且必須符合[語音合成標記語言 (SSML) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[語音合成標記語言參考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94)。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式使用字串，包含 SSML 標記，使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> to initiate the asynchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>起始非同步說話不包含 SSML 標記的字串。

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: 在這種方法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>可能會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出合成器的狀態變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 合成器開始產生語音時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 合成器到達字母或構成的個別音效的語音語言的字母組合，每次引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發合成器完成讀出的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 每次引發語音的輸出，則需要在說話或用來產生語音臉部 muscles 的位置變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 合成器遇到提示字元中的書籤時所引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 讀出的語音合成器的變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes processing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 合成器完成處理時，引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>作業。

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式 dos 不需要執行工作時，您可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>方法來以同步方式產生語音。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 開始讀出提示時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發這個事件時就會開始處理使用的任何提示<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>類別沒有屬性，而且不傳回資料來源<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓應用程式作者撰寫事件處理常式，如<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件目前的讀出狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 物件目前的讀出狀態。

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的新狀態<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>變更之後，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> before, during, and after speaking a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的狀態<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>之前、 期間和之後就在提示字元。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 變更 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> 的狀態時引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>引發這個事件時它說話<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例和相關聯的事件資料的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要暫停及繼續語音合成器，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: 到達視素 (Viseme) 時引發。

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Viseme 時說音素基本說話和圖示的位置。

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes 是音素的視覺化呈現。

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech 支援 21 visemes 美式英文，其中每一個都對應至一或多個的音素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> 當達到新音素具有不同的對應 viseme 比前一個音素達到時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: 因為某些 visemes 代表一個以上的音素<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>如果下一個音素到達對應至為前一個音素相同 viseme 不產生事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone".
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於口語 「 此區域 」， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> "this"中的"s"和"z"「 區域 」 中的就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this".
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>因為它會對應至相同的 viseme 為"this"中的"s"，"z"中 「 區域 」 不引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: 以下是 21 SAPI 音素轉換和對應於 U.S.english viseme 音素群組的清單。

trans-unit.source: Viseme
trans-unit.target: Viseme

trans-unit.target: Phoneme(s)

trans-unit.target: 無回應

trans-unit.target: ae，ax，ah

trans-unit.target: aa

trans-unit.target: ao

trans-unit.target: 金鑰，eh，喔

trans-unit.target: er

trans-unit.source: y, iy, ih, ix
trans-unit.target: y、 iy、 kartris、 ix

trans-unit.source: w, uw
trans-unit.target: w、 uw

trans-unit.source: ow
trans-unit.target: ow

trans-unit.source: aw
trans-unit.target: aw

trans-unit.source: oy
trans-unit.target: oy

trans-unit.source: ay
trans-unit.target: 結果

trans-unit.source: h
trans-unit.target: h

trans-unit.target: r

trans-unit.target: l

trans-unit.target: s, z

trans-unit.source: sh, ch, jh, zh
trans-unit.target: sh，ch、 jh、 zh-chs 和

trans-unit.target: th、 dh

trans-unit.target: f, v

trans-unit.target: k、 g、 ng
